dict.string: The FDA is pleased to offer the FDA MyStudies app as a tool to gather real time, contextual data about medication use and other health issues facing the people we serve.
Leveraging the Power of Mobility for Research
Available for iOS and Android devices, this app will house studies conducted by FDA and other institutions, enabling researchers to engage more directly with people to gather data via questionnaires.
Explore and participate in studies for which you are eligible and help generate more data, better insights and improved outcomes.
All studies in this app have been approved by an Institutional Review Board, follow strict federal research guidelines, and securely store your responses to ensure your privacy is always protected.
